main event: On 16 July 1951, a civilian sighted a bluish-white object moving in the sky over Fairborn, Ohio.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately five minutes,It moved side to side like a balloon,The object was described as having a color similar to a star and changing colors,The witness noted the absence of sound during the sighting,The object's altitude was estimated to be between 1600 to 2000 feet.
sighted object: a bluish-white object in the sky
witness description: Mr. Ray W. Taylor and his wife
